skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: from his heart podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des: From His Heart is the daily radio and television outreach of Dr. Jeff Schreve. Our teaching broadcast offers real truth, love and hope from the Bible to a lost and hurting world. Pastor Jeff believes that no matter how badly may have messed up in life, God still loves you and has a wonderful plan just for you. Learn more at www.fromhisheart.org.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
